caption.p: Age-specific survival rate ( l x) and fecundity ( m x) of adult Macrosiphum euphorbiae (n = 36–42) on ( A) well-watered and ( B) water-stressed potato plants at current day-night temperatures (25/15 °C) and ( C) on well-watered and ( D) water-stressed potato plants at high day-night temperatures (30/20 °C).
